question: A man walks 'a' km in 'b' hours. The time taken to walk 200 meters is :
explanation:
Man\'s Speed $latex = \\frac{Distance}{Time}&s=1$
$latex = \\frac{a}{b}km/hr&s=1$
$latex = \\frac{1000a}{b}m/hr&s=1$
âˆ´ Time taken in walking 200 metre
$latex = \\frac{200}{\\frac{1000a}{b}} = \\frac{b}{5a}hours&s=1$
Hence option [B] is correct answer.
